participant_1.background:
I am not sure if my co-worker likes me, but I have a dog named Max.
I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
I have a computer that can play rap music loudly so I can dance with my dog.
I hope my friends and family are doing well.
i have four siblings.

content.text: Hi there, what do you do for fun?
I usually spend my free time practicing music or reading about clothing trends.
Oh nice, I have a dog named Max and I like to take him for walks.
I don't like wearing a swimsuit but I like pears.
I like peaches and plums, but not pears.
I like to read about clothing trends and I'm a student trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I'm not sure if my co-worker likes me but I start my day early, walk my dog, and then work on my tasks until late at night, listening to music about animals.
My weekends are spent studying and looking over client files.
That sounds like a busy schedule.
It can be, but it's good to be busy.
That's a good attitude to have.
